job.title: Software Engineer (December 2021 and 2022 Grads Only)
job.description: we are draftkings were inspired by our shared passion for developing creative solutions to complex challenges and empowering the people around us to do their best work we are industry leaders in the digital entertainment and technology space propelled by constant curiosity and diverse perspectivesltbrgtltbrgtour teams are fueled by innovation we are looking ahead building whats next and continuously reinventing the industry were a publicly traded nasdaq dkng technology company headquartered in boston with teams around the world and an expanding global presenceltbrgtltbrgtget your start at a groundbreaking companyltbrgtltbrgtour engineering division is composed of many tightknit and stable teams that each own a specific area of our platform all the way from the ui to the database you will be assigned directly to one of these teams and will work alongside senior engineers responsible for bringing you up to speed we will value your ability to work closely with a group of your peers to achieve meaningful results and can offer an excellent platform for starting your career in engineeringltbrgtltbrgtwhat youll do as a software engineerltbrgtltulgtltligtwork with modern technologies on scalable reliable systems that people across our many technologypowered productsltligtltligtcontribute to production code immediatelyltligtltligtmove fast we roll out products very quickly and are looking for a team that can pivot at a moments noticeltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtwhat youll bringltbrgtltulgtltligtexposure to objectoriented languages eg c java swift or web programming languages eg javascript typescriptltligtltligtcollaborative teambased implementation either in an internship or project settingltligtltligtexperience with version control systems eg gitltligtltligtcuriosity for picking up new languages and technologiesltbrgtltbrgtltligtltulgtjoin usltbrgtltbrgtwe strive to create a place where all feel safe empowered engaged championed and inspired draftkings is proud to be an equal opportunity employer this means we do not tolerate discrimination of any kind and are committed to providing equal employment opportunities regardless of your gender identity race nationality religion sexual orientation status as a protected veteran or status as an individual with a disabilityltbrgtltbrgtready to build whats next apply nowltbrgtltbrgtas a regulated gaming company you may be required to obtain a gaming license issued by the appropriate state agency as a condition of employment
